reviewText: Only 7 films!  Not 15 as the ad implies.
Movies are very hard to understand unless you are from Britain or Ireland.  No closed captioning. There were a couple of movies I enjoyed. Hitchcocks later films were much more enjoyable.
Definitely for fans of the master of suspense!
Nice selection of early films which rarely appear on cable or satellite.
Not Hitchcock's best. But some of his earlier work. It will be good to look at this. Seller packaged DVD perfectly and sent it in a timely manner. Would not hesitate to purchase from seller again.

I've tried hard to like this set.  However, after viewing five of the films, I'm disheartened that the transfers to DVD lack any enhancement...the films were simply transferred with all the warts of the ravages of time included.  The soundtrack is muddled for the most part.  That, combined with the various British accents makes about half of the dialogue indecipherable, so I lose much of the story.  I hope I see improvement in the remaining 10 films, but don't expect to see anything better than what I've seen so far.
If your not a hitch fan , you may not like some of these titles. the film quality is not great on a few. But for this many movies at this low price. I am happy with this set.
